short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Official Minute Chrome extension for Google Calendar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Minute is the fastest way to have meetings. Using Minute Chrome extension you can easily take meeting notes, agendas, tasks, follow-ups without leaving your Google Calendar.

Features:
üìùTake pre-call and post-call meeting notes in the extension directly. Send the notes to your team in a single click.
‚≠ê Provide quick feedback or rate meetings to help your teammates get a better understanding of their meetings.
üè∑Ô∏è Organise your meetings into tags to get better analytics of your meetings and take actions on those metrics.
‚úîÔ∏è Connect your Gmail and Slack tasks into Minute and easily complete all pending tasks with reminders.

üí°How to use Minute:
1. Signup via Google Authentication on https://dash.getminute.co
2. Connect your Google Calendar
3. Download the Minute Chrome Extension
4. Start organising your meetings, take notes and other productivity tools :)


Check out more at https://getminute.com
